original_title: Sajith will get rid of some SJBers soon – Hirunika
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) Leader Sajith Premadasa will get rid of Sjbers who are really with President Ranil Wickremesinghe soon, former MP Hirunika Premachandra said yesterday.

“I have complained about some Sjbers who are dealing with the President and I expect the SJB leaders to take action against them before long. One has to wait and see what would happen,” Ms. Premachandra told journalists.
“Our leader should play the game like playing chess. One should use his head when engaged in politics,” she added.
“I will not leave SJB but will try my best to clean it and put it into the right track,” she also said.(Yohan Perera)
